name: Shardlings Prototype
description:
2d retro pixelated platformer!

Takes place in outer space, currently working to make enough gameplay for a trailer and early prototype. Not sure when early access will be created. Inspired by the classic old style games like mega man, shovel knight, and mario.

If you run into a under construction page press backspace. You can also press backspace from the world map to go back to world select.
